parts.text: {"word":"keserasian","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"Kesesuaian, harmoni, kecocokan, keseimbangan","english_definition":"Suitability, harmony, compatibility, balance","examples":[{"sentence":"Tidak ada keserasian antara warna dinding dan perabot.","translation":"There is no harmony between the wall color and the furniture.","english_sentence":"There is no harmony between the wall color and the color of the walls and the furniture."},{"sentence":"Keserasian antara suami dan istri sangat penting dalam pernikahan.","translation":"Compatibility between husband and wife is very important in marriage.","english_sentence":"Compatibility between a husband and wife is very important in a marriage."},{"sentence":"Desain interior ini menekankan pada keserasian antara fungsi dan estetika.","translation":"This interior design emphasizes the balance between function and aesthetics.","english_sentence":"This interior design emphasizes the harmony between function and aesthetics."}],"collocations":["keserasian warna (color harmony)","keserasian hubungan (relationship harmony)","keserasian desain (design harmony)","keserasian budaya (cultural harmony)"],"synonyms":["kesesuaian","keharmonisan","kecocokan","keseimbangan","kepersamaan"],"antonyms":["ketidakserasian","ketidakcocokan","pertentangan","konflik"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Berasal dari kata dasar 'serasi' (sesuai, cocok, harmonis) yang mendapat akhiran '-an' (membentuk kata benda).","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kə.səˈra.si.an/","syllables":"ke-se-ra-si-an"},"inflection":{"notes":"Kata benda (noun)"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Keserasian' digunakan untuk menggambarkan keadaan di mana berbagai elemen bekerja sama dengan baik, saling melengkapi, dan menciptakan kesan yang menyenangkan atau efektif. Ini bisa merujuk pada hubungan antarmanusia, desain, warna, atau berbagai aspek lainnya.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Dia mencari keserasian dalam hidupnya.","correct":"Dia mencari keharmonisan dalam hidupnya.","note":"'Keharmonisan' lebih tepat untuk menggambarkan keselarasan dalam kehidupan secara umum, sementara 'keserasian' lebih sering digunakan untuk hal-hal yang lebih konkret seperti desain atau warna."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["serasi (sesuai, cocok, harmonis)","menyerasi (menyesuaikan, mengharmonikan)","menyerasikan (menyesuaikan, mengharmonikan)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"Cukup sering digunakan dalam bahasa Indonesia formal dan tulisan.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Keserasian' adalah kata benda yang berarti keadaan cocok, harmonis, atau seimbang. Kata ini sering digunakan untuk menggambarkan hubungan yang baik antara dua hal atau lebih, misalnya dalam desain, hubungan antarmanusia, atau kombinasi warna.","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Keserasian antara pakaian dan aksesoris sangat penting untuk penampilan yang menarik.","translation":"The harmony between clothing and accessories is very important for an attractive appearance.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Kesesuaian dalam penampilan"},{"sentence":"Perusahaan ini mengutamakan keserasian antara kepentingan karyawan dan perusahaan.","translation":"This company prioritizes the balance between the interests of employees and the company.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Keseimbangan kepentingan"},{"sentence":"Keserasian dalam tim kerja menghasilkan produktivitas yang tinggi.","translation":"Harmony in a work team results in high productivity.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Keharmonisan dalam tim"}]}
